entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. A few flurries or rain showers beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
